CustomField.description: Some DLSE Programs are the same as others for the purpose of looking up DIR Accounting Codes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to find a DIR Accounting Code for a DLSE Program that is the same as another for the purpose of reporting to DIR Accounting. This field saves having to setup new Accounting Codes and Applicable Accounting Codes for a new DLSE Program.
CustomField.label: DIR Accounting Program
